availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Brobston (Jefferson County, Kentucky, plumber and gas fitter)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, plumber and gas fitter. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Randall Brobston in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on June 30, 1842. Father of Daniel Brobston, Henry Brobston, Mary Brobston, Annie Brobston, George Brobston, and Louwela Brobston. Married to Emma J. Radway Brobston in Medina County, Ohio, on November 2, 1854. Father of Lizzie Brobston. Glass cutter in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Gas fitter in Louisville in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1860. Plumber in partnership with Thomas Williams in Williams & Company in Louisville in 1861. Plumber in Louisville in 1863. Plumber in Louisville in 1865.
